pull.title: fuzz: Assert roundtrip equality for `CPubKey`
pull.body: This PR is a (quite late) follow-up to #19237 (https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19237#issuecomment-642203251). Looking at `CPubKey::Serialize` and `CPubKey::Unserialize` I can't think of a scenario where the roundtrip (serialization/deserialization) equality wouldn't hold.

events.body:
Post-merge cr ACK 9550dffa0c61df6d1591c62d09629b4c5731e1b7

Thanks for fixing this @theStack!

issue.title: Serialization-deserialization roundtrip of CPubKey does not necessarily result in an equal object
